references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: It establishes the importance of the DeepSeek R1 model, which is a key motivation for this paper.

references.paper_title: exo: Run your own ai cluster at home with everyday devices
references.reason: This paper presents an alternative distributed inference system for LLMs, serving as a direct benchmark and comparison point for prima.cpp.
This is the foundational work that prima.cpp builds upon, as it is a widely used inference engine and provides the basis for the current system's architecture.

references.paper_title: Parallelizing the dual revised simplex method
references.reason: This paper provides HiGHS, an ILP solver, which is the core algorithm leveraged to determine the best layer placement

references.paper_title: Galaxy: A resource-efficient collaborative edge ai system for in-situ transformer inference
references.reason: This is another competing distributed LLM system that influences the design and implementation of prima.cpp and is among the distributed approaches evaluated
